text: Nabagram is a village in Kumarganj, Balurghat subdivision, Dakshin Dinajpur district, West Bengal, India. There is a first primary school named NABAGRAM FP SCHOOL. This village is located at east-north of Dakshin Dinajpur district (India Bangladesh border). Category:Villages in Dakshin Dinajpur district
title: Nabagram, Dakshin Dinajpur
